task.title: Comprehensive broker reliability fixes: pre-registration, delivery finalization, log sanitization

events.content: Clear pending deliveries on delivery_injected (with event_id guard): Clear pending deliveries on delivery_injected (with event_id guard)

raw.question: Clear pending deliveries on delivery_injected (with event_id guard)
raw.chosen: Clear pending deliveries on delivery_injected (with event_id guard)
raw.reasoning: Prevents duplicate message re-injection while still rejecting stale lifecycle events with mismatched event_id.

events.content: Pre-register workers with Relaycast using normalized CLI hints: Pre-register workers with Relaycast using normalized CLI hints

raw.question: Pre-register workers with Relaycast using normalized CLI hints
raw.chosen: Pre-register workers with Relaycast using normalized CLI hints
raw.reasoning: Relaycast spawn/register now enforces allowed CLI values; broker must send canonical cli (claude/codex/gemini/aider/goose) to avoid 400 failures.

retrospective.summary: Implemented robust broker fixes: pre-registration with canonical Relaycast CLI, strict worker identity env, pending-delivery finalization on delivery_injected with stale-event guard, and normalized worker log chunk persistence.
